description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=3/3. Doom & Destiny is an old-school RPG with an unconventional mood. Strange events bring four nerdy friends in a fantasy world made of cliche, strange people and a lot of humor. Featuring more than 15 hours of fun, 100 skills to defeat the 200+ enemies and over 300 between items and equipment D&D is a must have in your collection.
